title: Missing JAX-B guide

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Describe the bug

XML serialization is supported via JAX-B but no guide exist.
We could create a "WRITING XML REST SERVICES" close to the JSON one: https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-json
